noun.description: An association or organization dedicated to a particular interest or activity.

examples: she enjoys going clubbing in Orlando

phrases: The last I heard of him was that his girlfriend was in the club and they left, leaving us alone again.
if you're confused, join the club!
So you see, when the Prime Minister says he could do with some co-operation, join the club, so could we.
But if you're wondering what the hell I'm stammering about in the final minute, join the club!
origin: Middle English: from Old Norse clubba, variant of klumba; related to clump.
